str2: So that, therefore, so then, so as to. From hos and te; so too, i.e. Thus therefore.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From para and kaleo; to call near, i.e. Invite, invoke.

parse: Personal / Reciprocal Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: One another, each other. Genitive plural from allos reduplicated; one another.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
